reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous and beautifully made.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous Gown!
items.body: Beautiful and well made gown, fabric is comfortable, not scratchy at all, it's true to size! Mine fits a little big, but that's only because I released some extra weight. This gown is gorgeous! Read more
items.author: Rebecca T.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars WONDERFUL DRESS!! WONDERFUL CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!
items.body: of course like all things- we are skeptical of ordering online, but I took a chance and was SO HAPPY I DID!!! After ordering the dress I contacted the seller and emailed them my measurements and they sent me the dress so quickly. I was nervous of course because they said it wouldn't be able to be returned since it was made for my size. and it fit perfectly. I NEVER had a dress fit me so well... I will BUY from this seller again... ONCE i get pictures I WILL UPDATE this post. but I just had to leave a quick review because I was so happy with this purchase.. Read more
items.author: Jbl1230

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty and a nice fit. Has a train and it does come wrinkled.
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Surprisingly attractive but not as shown in the picture. Providing a video so you can actually see up close what it looks like. Fits nicely too Read more
items.author: PG

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good buy
items.body: Loved the dress. Received a lot of compliments. The fit was good. I was surprised at how heavy it was with the many layers. Which was good. Read more
items.author: Tara

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow!
items.body: Wow! This dress blew me away. Absolutely stunning! The material is soft with sequin accents on the top, satin fabric bottom. It has pockets! Received numerous compliments on the dress. Very flattering on my petite not so little frame. I sized up worried that it wouldn’t fit. I could have gone with my regular size. I am 5’1”, 150lbs ordered a 10. I had to have the dress altered due to the length. I wore 3in heels. I also had the sleeves altered to 3/4, they were long, didn’t look bad just a preference. The slit in the dress gives it an elegant sexy look. Wore as MoB dress could be used for any special occasion, such as a banquet or Christmas party. Definitely a great purchase. Read more
items.author: Angelina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size
items.body: Use the dress for Gala got multiple compliments. The quality of the dress was spot on very good for a low cost. Read more
items.author: Kara Estenson

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars RETURN INFORMATION
items.body: I am returning this dress & tracking number is 1Z1R12V10349120839. The material/make of this dress is BEAUTIFULLY made! The dress came SOONER than the time frame Amazon provides after purchase so this dress is great to order if you want it to arrive fast! The only reason why I am returning it because the back of the dress is a drawstring/corset style. The dress did NOT come with the ribbon to tie it all together? Also I am returning this dress because it did not make sense of why the back of this dress was corset tie style? Usually for plus size dresses this is normal BUT I originally bought this dress in a larger size (size 26) & that dress was made with a zipper that zipped you up on the back. The only reason why I wanted to go a size down was because size 26 fit well but is slightly loose in the chest area/arms of the dress. I wanted to go a size down & ordered size 24 just to find that the smaller dress had the open back corset style. I would have kept the dress if it was made with a zipper on the back like the larger dress I initially ordered. I am keeping the size 26 that I originally purchased, but was disappointed that the smaller size was not the same style as the larger one. I would like to recommend for the seller to make the return process easier if possible. Most Amazon Prime items that I purchase can be sent back to Kohl's for a free return. Overall this was a great purchase! Read more
items.author: Shiyeng Vang

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening V Neck Long Sleeve Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening V Neck Long Sleeve Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Aqua, Fuchsia, Grey Blue, Dusty Pink, Black, Champagne, Orange, Peacock, Blush Pink, Royal Blue, Grey, Gold, Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
